Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCPRM1 WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY PROYCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_ITCPRM1 ( ITCDPRM1CODI, PROYCODI, ELECTRODUCTO, DESCRIPCION, VN, TIPO, SECCION, CTR, R, X, B, RO, XO, BO, CAPACIDAD, TMXOP, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :ITCDPRM1CODI, :PROYCODI, :ELECTRODUCTO, :DESCRIPCION, :VN, :TIPO, :SECCION, :CTR, :R, :X, :B, :RO, :XO, :BO, :CAPACIDAD, :TMXOP, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_ITCPRM1 SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, ELECTRODUCTO = :ELECTRODUCTO, DESCRIPCION = :DESCRIPCION, VN = :VN, TIPO = :TIPO, SECCION = :SECCION, CTR = :CTR, R = :R, X = :X, B = :B, RO = :RO, XO = :XO, BO = :BO, CAPACIDAD = :CAPACIDAD, TMXOP = :TMXOP, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE ITCDPRM1CODI = :ITCDPRM1CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCPRM1 ORDER BY ITCDPRM1CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_ITCPRM1 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCPRM1 WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY ITCDPRM1CODI ASC
